no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric descriptor provides information about the structure of the metric, it's keys and values.

adminFunction.description: Function required to update this metric descriptor.

customer.description: Customer that the metric descriptor belongs to.

deduplicationFunction.description: Function used while submitting a metric record, to calculate value if duplicates within same time frame appear.

domain.description: Domain that the metric descriptor belongs to.

flags.description: Flags assigned to the metric descriptor.

items.description: Flags assigned to the metric descriptor.

localizedDescription.description: Description of the metric descriptor based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available descriptions of the metric descriptor

localizedDescriptions.description: All available descriptions of the metric descriptor

localizedName.description: Name of the metric descriptor based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available names of the metric descriptor

localizedNames.description: All available names of the metric descriptor

name.description: Name of the metric descriptor. This does not need to be unique.

readFunction.description: Function required to fetch metric record and this metric descriptor.

shortName.description: Short name of the metric descriptor. This name is unique per domain.

timeFrameSize.description: Time period given in the timeFrameSizeUnit and is used for normalizing the timestamp of submitted metric records.

timeFrameSizeUnit.description: Largest full time unit that can be made from the timeFrameSize.

writeFunction.description: Function required to submit metric record.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric descriptor Key provides information about the metric key.

language.description: Language used for the human readable string.

localizedDescription.description: Description of the metric key based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available descriptions of the metric key

localizedDescriptions.description: All available descriptions of the metric key

localizedName.description: Name of the metric key based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available names of the metric key

localizedNames.description: All available names of the metric key

translator.description: Translator for key value to human readable string.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric descriptor value provides information about the metric value.

defaultAggregationFunction.description: Default function applied to calculate values for resolution specified in aggregation request. This property is used only for aggregation queries.

defaultWeightByValue.description: Default value used as weight when aggregating using a weighted average function.

localizedDescription.description: Description of the metric value based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available descriptions of the metric value

localizedDescriptions.description: All available descriptions of the metric value

localizedName.description: Name of the metric value based on the current user's language settings.

additionalProperties.description: All available names of the metric value

localizedNames.description: All available names of the metric value

unit.description: The unit in which the value is measured

customer.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified customers (customer ID or shortname).

items.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified customers (customer ID or shortname).

domain.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified domains (domain ID or shortname).

items.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified domains (domain ID or shortname).

excludeFlags.description: Exclude descriptors which have excludeFlags set.

items.description: Exclude descriptors which have excludeFlags set.

includeDeleted.description: Include descriptors which have been deleted.

includeFlags.description: Include descriptors which have includeFlags set.

items.description: Include descriptors which have includeFlags set.

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

keywords.description: Restrict search to entries containing keywords in description.

items.description: Restrict search to entries containing keywords in description.

limit.description: Set this value to set max number of results.

offset.description: Set this value to skip the first (offset) objects. By default, return result from first object.

subCriteria.description: Set additional criterias to be applied as specified in the subcriteria object(s) (AND, AND NOT, OR).

customer.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified customers (customer ID or shortname).

items.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified customers (customer ID or shortname).

domain.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified domains (domain ID or shortname).

items.description: Restrict search to entries bound to specified domains (domain ID or shortname).

exclude.description: If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria object will be excluded.

excludeFlags.description: Exclude descriptors which have excludeFlags set.

items.description: Exclude descriptors which have excludeFlags set.

includeFlags.description: Include descriptors which have includeFlags set.

items.description: Include descriptors which have includeFlags set.

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

keywords.description: Restrict search to entries containing keywords in description.

items.description: Restrict search to entries containing keywords in description.

required.description: If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria are required (AND-ed together with parent criteria).

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric aggregate is used to return result of aggregation.

customer.description: Customer that the metric aggregate belongs to or null if cross-customer aggregate.

keys.description: Keys associated to the metric aggregate.

metricDescriptorID.description: Unique identifier of the metric descriptor.

metricTimestamp.description: Timestamp of metric aggregate. 0 if query is not time-based.

values.description: Measured values for the metric aggregate.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric record key provides value of the metric key.

translation.description: Translation of the key value to a human readable string.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric record value provides information about metric values.

unit.description: The unit in which the value is measured

value.description: Actual value of the metric value.

name.description: Name of the 'key' type field the interval is set on.

values.description: Set of discrete values the records will be filtered with. This field uses 'Where value in' logic. Please make sure the values type is congruent with the key field type. For IP addresses only single IPs are allowed. Can't be used with ranges.

items.description: Set of discrete values the records will be filtered with. This field uses 'Where value in' logic. Please make sure the values type is congruent with the key field type. For IP addresses only single IPs are allowed. Can't be used with ranges.

gt.description: Include only records with the key values larger than the value in this field.

lt.description: Include only records with the key values smaller than the value in this field.

gte.description: Include only records with the key values larger then or equal to the value in this field. Can't be used together with 'gt'

lte.description: Include only records with the key values smaller then or equal to the value in this field. Can't be used together with 'lt'

cidrs.description: CIDR masks. Logically OR'd together. Only for keys holding ip addresses. Can't be used together with ranges or discrete values.

items.description: CIDR masks. Logically OR'd together. Only for keys holding ip addresses. Can't be used together with ranges or discrete values.

key.description:
Name of the key you want to have the results grouped by, results will return one bucket for each found key value.
Additionally supports 'customer' as an option.

limit.description: Set this value to set max number of results. Min 1, max 10000

calendarInterval.description: States the calendar interval the aggregation results should be sorted by, such as month or year.It only allows for a resolution of 1, and overrides the resolution unit such that if calendar interval is week, then the result will be in intervals of 1 whole week, expanding backwards in time for start and forwards for end. It is by defaults not used and set to null.

customer.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

items.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

customerDomain.description: Restrict result set to records with customers from the specific domain. The field accepts ID or shortname for the domain.

endTimestamp.description: Restrict result set to records submitted before this time. Allows the use of unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

groupBy.description: List of descriptor's key names for aggregating the result. The result will be grouped into key buckets up to the limit given.The buckets themselves will be ordered in a descending order based on the values aggregated.

groupByCustomer.description: States whether Metric records will be aggregated by customers. Deprecated, use the groupBy field.

includeOthers.description: States whether the aggregation results will contain buckets for the data not included in the keys given by the groupBy field.Is not used if the groupBy field is empty. It defaults to true.

keyIntervals.description: List of key intervals, to filter the aggregation on.

additionalProperties.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

keys.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

resolution.description: Aggregation resolution period in units specified by 'resolutionUnit' property. If 0 the resolution is the entire time span given by the start and end timestamps. If the expected combination of timestamps, resolution, and resolution unit would result in more buckets than ElasticSearch permits, which is 10000, then the request will be denied. Note that the initial calculation on this is rough, and that ES might still deny the request. In which case lower the resolution.

skipKeyTranslation.description: Whether to skip key translation and return the raw value.

sortBy.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

items.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

startTimestamp.description: Restrict result set to records submitted after this time.Allows the use of unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

subCriteria.description: Set additional criterias to be applied as specified in the subcriteria object(s) (AND, AND NOT, OR).

timeZone.description:
Settable Timezone. For more information please refer to official java documentation
https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/12211/wcs/tag-ref/MISC/TimeZones.html
If not set the data will be localized according to user's timezone.

values.description: Descriptor's values included in aggregation result.

aggregationFunction.description: Aggregation function used for aggregating the result. Defaults to the metric descriptor's 'defaultAggregationFunction'.

name.description: Name of the 'value' type field the aggregation should be performed on.

weightByValue.description: Which 'value' type field should be used as weight. This field is required for wavg aggregate function, it is not used by other functions.

customer.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

items.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

customerDomain.description: Restrict result set to records with customers from the specific domain. The field accepts ID or shortname for the domain.

exclude.description: If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria object will be excluded.

keyIntervals.description: List of key intervals, to filter the aggregation on.

additionalProperties.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

keys.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

required.description: If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria are required (AND-ed together with parent criteria).

customer.description: The customer the subject belongs to

items.description: The subject's flags

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric descriptor info provides shortened information about the descriptor.

shortName.description: Short name of the  metric descriptor. This name is unique per domain.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: Metric record is used to return result of metric search.

customer.description: Customer that the metric record belongs to.

descriptor.description: Descriptor that the metric record belongs to.

id.description: ID of the metric as required by ES

keys.description: List of key associated to the metric record.

metricTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the metric record provided by client.

submissionTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the metric record submission.

submittedByUser.description: User which submitted the metric record.

values.description: List of measured values for a given metricTimestamp.

customer.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

items.description: Restrict result set to records bound to specified customers. The list accepts both ID or shortname for the customers. For global metrics, this field will be ignored and overridden with customer with id 0.

customerDomain.description: Restrict result set to records with customers from the specific domain. The field accepts ID or shortname for the domain.

endTimestamp.description: Restrict result set to records submitted before this time. Allows the use of unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

keyIntervals.description: List of key intervals, to filter the aggregation on.

additionalProperties.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

keys.description: Restrict result set to records with these key names and key values. Must match the keys given in the descriptor, but IP type allows using IP ranges, such as 192.168.0.0/16 for IPv4 or 2001:db8::/48 for IPv6. Deprecated, use keyIntervals instead.

limit.description: Set this value to set max number of results. Cannot exceed 10000 which is the Elasticsearch search window.

offset.description: Set this value to skip the first (offset) objects. By default, return result from first object.Cannot, in combination with the limit, exceed 10000, as this will exceed the Elasticsearch search window.

skipKeyTranslation.description: Whether to skip key translation and return the raw value.

sortBy.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

items.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

startTimestamp.description: Restrict result set to records submitted after this time.Allows the use of unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

subCriteria.description: Set additional criterias to be applied as specified in the subcriteria object(s) (AND, AND NOT, OR).

timeZone.description:
Settable Timezone. For more information please refer to official java documentation
https://docs.oracle.com/middleware/12211/wcs/tag-ref/MISC/TimeZones.html
If not set the data will be localized according to user's timezone.

adminFunction.description: Function required to update this metric descriptor.

customer.description: ID or shortname of customer bound to this metric descriptor. If not specified, descriptor is domain global

deduplicationFunction.description: Function used while submitting a metric record, to calculate value if duplicates within same time frame appear.

domain.description: ID or shortname of domain bound to this metric descriptor.

globalDescriptor.description: Whether this descriptor is intended for records that are not customer specific.

keepAuditData.description: Whether to maintain a record of data useful for auditing.

keepBackup.description: Whether to keep a separate record of the metric as a backup outside ElasticSearch.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

name.description: Name of the metric descriptor. Does not need to be unique.

readFunction.description: Function required to fetch metric descriptor and associated records.

shortName.description: Short name of the metric descriptor. Must be unique per domain.

timeFrameSize.description: Time period used for setting up time frames. For each time frame, deduplicationFunction property is used to determine value(s) of metric record.

timeFrameSizeUnit.description: Unit of the timeFrameSize value, this is used as the default resolution unit during aggregation.

useSeparateIndex.description: Whether the separate index for metric records is used or not.

writeFunction.description: Function required to submit metric record.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.request..description: Request to create a metric descriptor key

language.description: Language of the translation used on the key value.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor key descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor key descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor key names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor key names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

name.description: Name of the metric key. Will be validated against a list of reserved names, which include 'customer'.

translator.description: Translator that can be used for the key value.

type.description: Type of the metric key, IP allows both IPv4 and IPv6.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.request..description: Request to create a metric descriptor value

defaultAggregationFunction.description: Default function applied to calculate values for resolution specified in aggregation request. This property is used only for aggregation queries.

defaultWeightByValue.description: Default value used as weight when aggregating using a weighted average function.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor value descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor value descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor value names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor value names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

unit.description: The unit in which the value is measured

language.description: New Language for the key value.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor key descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor key descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor key names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor key names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

name.description: Name of the metric key. Used to identify, not update, the key.

translator.description: Translator that can be used for the key value.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.request..description: Request to update a descriptor a sub-set of a value's, identified by name, fields

defaultAggregationFunction.description: Default function applied to calculate values for resolution specified in aggregation request. This property is used only for aggregation queries.

defaultWeightByValue.description: Default value used as weight when aggregating using a weighted average function.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor value descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor value descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor value names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor value names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

name.description: Name of the metric value. Used to identify, not update, the value.

unit.description: The unit in which the value is measured

addKeys.description: Descriptors for metric keys to add. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

addValues.description: Descriptors for metric values to add. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

adminFunction.description: Function required to update this metric descriptor.

deduplicationFunction.description: Function used while submitting a metric record, to calculate value if duplicates within same time frame appear.

keepAuditData.description: Whether to maintain a record of data useful for auditing.

keepBackup.description: Whether to keep a separate record of the metric as a backup outside ElasticSearch.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedDescriptions.description: Metric descriptor descriptions mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

additionalProperties.description: Metric descriptor names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

localizedNames.description: Metric descriptor names mapped by language. Supported languages are: english, norwegian.

name.description: Name of the metric descriptor. Does not need to be unique.

readFunction.description: Function required to fetch metric descriptor and associated records.

removeKeys.description: Descriptors for metric keys to remove. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

items.description: Descriptors for metric keys to remove. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

removeValues.description: Descriptors for metric values to remove. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

items.description: Descriptors for metric values to remove. Previously accepted metrics will still exist and considered valid, but new submissions must match the changed descriptor.

shortName.description: Short name of the metric descriptor. Must be unique per domain.

timeFrameSize.description: Time period used for setting up time frames. For each time frame, deduplicationFunction property is used to determine value(s) of metric record.

timeFrameSizeUnit.description: Unit of the timeFrameSize value, this is used as the default resolution unit during aggregation.

updateKeys.description: Descriptors for metric keys to update. Only the translator and language can be updated while name is used to identify the key to modify.

updateValues.description: Descriptors for metric values to update. Only the default aggregation and value by weight can be updated while the name is used to identify the value to modify.

useSeparateIndex.description: Whether the separate index for metric records is used or not. If value of this property is 'true', changing is not permitted.

writeFunction.description: Function required to submit metric record.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: MetricSubmissionErrorInformation provides information about submission problems.

items.description: String message of error cause.

submissionIndex.description: Index of the submission as it appears in the submission request.

no.mnemonic.services.metric.spi.response.description: MetricSubmissionStatsResponse provides information about success and fail or record submissions.

errorInformationList.description: Information regarding any metrics that failed during submission.

success.description: Number of successfully submitted metric records.

ignoreOnFailed.description: Set this value for successful response even failures occur while submitting.

customer.description: ID or shortname of customer owning the metric record. This will default to current user's customer if not set. For global metrics, this field should not be set.

customerDomain.description: ID or shortname of domain for customer owning the metric record.

additionalProperties.description: Keys for the metric record.
Measured values for the metric record.

values.description: Measured values for the metric record.

field.description: Field which this message applies to

count.description: Number of available results on server
